steps.name: User Launch Amazon Mobile App and select on "Already a customer? Sign in" Already a customer? Sign in Option
User Enter Password as "$ER$4er4" and clicks on "Sign In" Sign In Button
User is Landed to Amazon Home page
User Entered the search as "samsung mobile phones"
